definition: A specific sector or industry that encompasses a group of related businesses or companies, typically sharing similar products, services, or activities. It is commonly used to refer to a particular field or line of business within the economy.

examples.german: Die Automobilbranche ist eine wichtige Industrie in Deutschland.
examples.english: The automotive industry is an important industry in Germany.

examples.german: Die Modebranche ist bekannt für ihre schnellen Trends.
examples.english: The fashion industry is known for its fast trends.

examples.german: Die IT-Branche boomt und bietet viele Arbeitsmöglichkeiten.
examples.english: The IT industry is booming and offers many job opportunities.

examples.german: Die Tourismusbranche leidet unter den Auswirkungen der Pandemie.
examples.english: The tourism industry is suffering from the effects of the pandemic.
The food industry has strict hygiene regulations.
